name: Fiesta loca
description:
English

A very short story made in flickgame about a girl who gets invited to a party that is going to take place that very night. You play it by clicking on different things.

Castellano

Una historia breve hecha con flickgame sobre una chica a la que le llega una invitación para una fiesta esa misma noche. Se juega cliqueando diferentes cosas.
